channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 'There's never been a spotlight like this': Greenland heads to the polls as Trump eyes territory
item.description: Donald Trump's vow to take over Greenland has shone a global spotlight on the island's elections.

item.title: On Harriet Tubman Day, a new effort to place the abolitionist on the $20 bill launches
item.description: The latest measure, sponsored by Sen. Jeanne Shaheen, a Democrat from New Hampshire, follows years of delays and efforts to have Harriet Tubman replac...

item.title: Does the narwhal's famous tusk help it catch fish?
item.description: Intriguing video of narwhals using their tusks to mess with fish has scientists speculating about what this behavior might mean.

item.title: Mar 10: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: U.S. tanker collides with container ship off the coast of U.K.; Vatican says Pope Francis experienced "good response" to recent hospital treatments.

item.title: US expects 'substantial progress' in peace talks with Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine is under US pressure to accept a quick truce to end the war with Russia, with US-Ukrainian talks set to begin in Saudi Arabia.

item.title: How the science of savoring can help you nurture your relationships
item.description: Learn this simple practice that researchers say can strengthen bonds with loved ones and improve your daily well-being.

item.title: Robert De Niro on taking dual crime boss roles in "The Alto Knights"
item.description: Robert De Niro revealed the dual role, where he portrays both Frank and Vito, required precise positioning and careful coordination.

item.title: Musk's Tesla facilities in US face 'Takedown' protests
item.description: It is part of an effort to protest the role Tesla's billionaire owner, Elon Musk, has played in the Trump administration.

item.title: Stock market falls sharply as investors fret Trump policies
item.description: Stocks continue to slide on Monday, following its worst week since September as president's protectionist policies darken economic view.

item.title: Drawing huge crowds, Bernie Sanders steps into leadership of the anti-Trump resistance
Syria says operation against Assad loyalists over after deadly violence
item.description: A monitoring group says 973 civilians have been killed in revenge attacks against the Alawite sect since Thursday.

item.title: Ukraine tries to bolster troops in Kursk as Putin's forces advance
item.description: Ukraine tries to reinforce troops in Russia's Kursk region as Putin's forces retake ground amid Trump's aid and intel pause.

item.title: 5 things to know about Mark Carney, Canada's next prime minister
item.description: Mark Carney is a newcomer to elected politics with decades of experience in finance. After his landslide victory, he pledged to continue tariffs on th...

item.title: Immigration agents arrest Palestinian activist who helped lead Columbia University protests
Stocks slide as Trump warns of US economy 'transition'
item.description: New retaliatory tariffs from China targeting some US farm products came into effect on Monday.

item.title: When you should get a home equity loan from a different lender
item.description: Should you use a new lender to get your home equity loan? Here's when it may be worth doing.

item.title: Top 'Washington Post' columnist resigns, accusing publisher of killing piece
item.description: Washington Post columnist Ruth Marcus resigned today, accusing the paper's publisher of killing her piece on owner Jeff Bezos' overhaul of its opinion...

item.title: A single-engine plane crashes near a Pennsylvania airport and all 5 aboard are taken to hospitals
item.description: A single-engine airplane with five people on board crashed and burst into flames in a parking lot near a small airport in suburban Pennsylvania.
